评论详情: I ordered 3 packs of these, there were only 11 in each box.

I bought these for my river trip recently and was pleasantly surprised by the quality, style, and comfort of these sunglasses. The variety of looks these glasses have is hilarious but there are definitely some in here that can't be worn by those with large noggins or faces. Funny styles, very comfortable fits, good value, as well as being actually decent at doing the whole sun protection thing. I felt like a fashion magazine editor on a river trip with these things and it was exceptionally extra in all the right ways.

We ordered these about a week before our wedding and they were great as we did not want to spend much effort coming up with a more creative idea. I liked that there were 2 different heart shaped ones that my husband and I wore. Each came in their own plastic sleeve and fit everyone’s head for the purposes of taking photos. We have since not used them for anything else lol
Got these for my daughter’s birthday party and everyone loved them. My best friend lost hers from the party and went on Amazon to buy the whole party pack again just to replace the glasses she lost 😂
We used them for a sweet 16 party favor. Fun for photos
Awesome! I purchased for a Barbie themed party and they were just perfect. Great quality and so fun!
I brought these to a weekend getaway and everyone took a pair and made great pictures
High quality sunglasses we loved them. So many compliments and different styles for everyone. Such a great price point. Don’t hesitate to buy these.

Truly I bought this whole lot just for one pair of glasses. I ended up absolutely loving all but 3-4. They come in a nice sturdy box and are so cute!! I’m so glad I bought the whole lot and can’t believe how cute these turned out. The glasses are obviously cheap material and I am buying to wear on vacation but they are perfect for that!
Purchased for my photography client closet, the seniors love them!
Great set for birthday loot bag for girls!
